FM of DPRK Meets Namibian, Canadian Ambassadors 
   Pyongyang, September 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun separately met and had talks with Leonard Nambahu and Edward Ted Lipman, Namibian and Canadian ambassadors to the DPRK on Thursday when they paid courtesy calls on him.
